title: DDFP 148: Schedule Release
itunes:title: DDFP 148: Schedule Release
description:
In the 148th episode of the "Dave Dameshek Football Program," Dave and Adam Rank welcome in NFL Network comrades Shaun O'Hara and Darren Sharper to pull back the curtain on life as an NFL player. How much do players pay attention to the schedule? And which of our guests once ate a hot dog in a locker room bathroom? The good, the bad and the ugly of playing on the road is revealed. Then, Shek and Rank are joined by NFL.com columnist and football historian Elliot Harrison for a week-by-week breakdown of the best games of the 2103 season. Plus, the guys preview the NBA Playoffs, Matt Barkley's NFL future, and much more. Grab your calendars and take a listen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
